chapter.para:
Ende: Matthias Hoelzer KDE-Verein i.G. Account-Nr. 2798296
Staedtische Sparkasse Wuerzburg Hofstrasse 9 97070 Wuerzburg Germany BLZ 790 500 00 SWIFT-Address: BYLA DE 77 print "$b4 /path/to/KDE/libs/libpng.a $af\n";\ hello
chapter.screen: Expect ogin: # Dies ist alles nicht so schlimm! ID "" # kppp sends the id you configured in the main dialog Expect for userxyz: # a list of available numbers is shown, the user should choose one Send userxyz-home # the user wants to be called back on their home number Expect ogin: # The callback process is now running, a new connection, and so a new login. ID Expect assword: # Now send your password Expect > # Wait for the command prompt (the prompt may vary) Send start_ppp # this command starts the pppd
Send # send einen leerenstring Expect ID: Send itsme Expect word: Send forgot Expect granted Send ppp
